entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING ENDED, Pemberton
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 6:08 PM PST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: Snow at times heavy mixed with freezing rain. Temperature steady near minus 1.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy. Snow mixed with freezing rain early this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 1. Wind chill minus 4 this evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday: Periods of snow mixed with rain. Temperature steady near zero.
entry.summary: Periods of snow mixed with rain and risk of freezing rain. Snowfall amount 5 cm. Temperature steady near zero. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of snow mixed with rain. Temperature rising to plus 4 by morning.
entry.summary: Periods of snow mixed with rain changing to rain near midnight. Risk of freezing rain in the evening. Temperature rising to plus 4 by morning. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Saturday 24 December 2022
